!Cheiren: Let me tell you about the mission. Hunt Ragna Orcs and the Evil Spirit of Baranka, the Destroyer of Baranka. Since they are possessed by evil spirits emanating from the Ragna Orc Amulets they wear, you must retrieve those accursed pendants. The more you bring me, the higher your reward. Some Ragna Orcs carry the Soul Core Containing Evil Spirit instead of an amulet. If you collect 10 of those, you may challenge the Leader of the Ragna Orcs to a duel. Do not do so lightly!
